name: Stranded Hearts
description:
Stranded Hearts is a lesbian romance/survival sim.

Three completely different women become stranded on an uninhabited island. As Aina Monteil's past unravels amidst the harsh survival situation, will she be able to form a genuine connection for the first time in her life?

Features:

  • Female protagonist
  • Story-rich
  • Thrilling romance
  • Survival stat-management sim

The demo/jurijam entry features the first 5 days of the game (out of 30-45).

Enjoy!
